library.description: Qwery is a small blazing fast query selector engine allowing you to select elements with CSS1|2|3 queries
library.name: Qwery

library.description:
DOMBuilder
It is template mechanism, which creates DOM elements. It doesn't uses concatenating strings.
library.name: rafaelkyrdan/DOMBuilder

library.description: Paperclip is a simple, yet powerful reactive template engine built for speed, and extensibility.  It works by compiling templates to document fragments, then clones them whenever they're needed. The result is blazing-fast rendering with very few moving parts.
library.name: PaperclipJS

library.description:
Crafter.js is a frontend library for creating interactive websites using webcomponents, models, traditional dom manip, databinding and webcomponents.

it offers :
* routing
* custom elements
* custom attributes
* script/style loader
* simplified websocket wrapper
* data-binding and observables
* awesome and easy event handling
* rich dom manipulation system
* react like element creation
* observe and react to dom changes

Feel free to fork and contribute
library.name: Crafter.js

library.description:
A JavaScript game development library aiming for compatibility with every desktop browser and mobile device while being fast and modular.

Note that development happens at bitbucket.
library.name: friGame

library.description: IST is a javascript DOM templating engine using a CSS selector-like syntax. It supports custom directives (much like Handlebars block helpers) and handles arbitrary JS expressions inside templates.
library.name: ist.js
